level.heading: Beneficial owner's right to information.
level.text: A beneficial owner shall have the right to receive from the statutory trust or a trustee information relating to the affairs of a statutory trust which is reasonably related to the beneficial owner's interest. The beneficial owner may enforce this right by summary proceeding in the Superior Court.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 29-1201.04 and § 29-1206.14.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 608 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
